1.12.2.1.0.3.0: Add water biomes with new user config.
1.12.2.1.0.3.1: Add max cave altitude option. Add extra boundary checks to prevent crashes with some mods.
1.12.2.1.4.0: Add dimension whitelisting. Change versioning system to MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH. Update gradle build to be better.
1.12.2.1.5.0: Add cavern edge smoothing. Fix biome controllers. Reorganize config. Add global whitelisting option.
1.12.2.1.5.1: Vanilla MC clients can now connect to Forge servers running Better Caves. Bedrock no longer gets carved out.
